H0.text: Sweat stops sunburn on the skin, helping the body.

H1.text: Sweat cools the body by evaporating from the skin, helping regulate body temperature.

H2.text: Sweat feeds the skin on the body.

H3.text: Sweat heals cuts on the skin, helping the body recover from minor injuries.

A4.text: Sweating causes a decrease in core temperature through evaporative cooling at the skin surface.
